word: "I saw no temple therein; for the Lord God Almighty and the Lamb are the temple of it." [Revelation 21:22.] The people of God are privileged to hold open communion with the Father and the Son. Now we "see through a glass, darkly." [1 Corinthians 13:12.] We behold the image of God reflected, as in a mirror, in the works of nature and in his dealings with men; but then we shall see him face to face, without a dimming vail between. We shall stand in his presence, and gaze upon the glory of his countenance.
